Support for Moving Data on SAMR Meshes

These classes provide fundamental inter-patch communication functionality applicable to a wide range of AMR algorithms. They are implemented in a generic fashion with respect to the actual structure of the data involved in the communication procedures.

  • SAMRAI::xfer::CoarsenAlgorithm
  • SAMRAI::xfer::CoarsenClasses
  • SAMRAI::xfer::CoarsenCopyTransaction
